name: clogged
content:

blocked or filled with something: clogged pipes The roads quickly became clogged with traffic. See
clog
More examplesFewer examplesPumps often became clogged.Clogged arteries can be held open with tiny wire cylinders called stents.Blackheads are the result of oily skin and clogged pores.
